name: Magical Girl Mayhem: Helping the Town with Fetch Quests
name_original: Magical Girl Mayhem: Helping the Town with Fetch Quests
description:
Edit:*updated game, trying to get game ending sequence to work*

Help by ignoring the bigger problems at hand and help villagers do basics tasks they can easily do themselves. Work in Progress for the Magical Girl Game Jam 6.  My first game like this, and I got a tad caught up in the scope/messing with animations, but it came out cute after working on it for the month of the game jam. There isn't really an ending yet, but I wanted to submit early to avoid trouble, since the announcement said we can update it if needed. 

Edit:*updated game, trying to get game ending sequence to work*
